issue.title: [Packaging][Release] Set conda packages' build number to 0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9511](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9511). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The artifacts patterns in the crossbow tasks definitions expect conda packages with build number 0. We should keep the build number always zero in the vendored conda-forge recipes.
